type LocalBuilder = class inherit LocalVariableInfo interface _LocalBuilder

summary.span: 表示方法或构造函数内的局部变量。

span.span: Represents a local variable within a method or constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`LocalBuilder`对象可使用定义方法。A `LocalBuilder` object can be defined using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建`static`方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名为`Function1`会返回一个字符串，并具有类型参数。The following example creates a `static` method (`Shared` in Visual Basic) named `Function1` that returns a string and has a parameter of type . 在该方法的正文中，该代码示例创建对象表示的两个本地变量，并设置符号的本地变量的信息。In the body of the method, the code example creates objects representing two local variables, and sets symbol information for the local variables. 方法不执行任何重要操作，但方法正文演示了将存储到本地变量，存储本地变量的文本字符串和加载本地变量的参数。The method does not do anything significant, but the method body demonstrates storing a parameter to a local variable, storing a literal string to a local variable, and loading a local variable. [!code-cpp[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/CPP/localbuilder_sample_4.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/CS/localbuilder_sample_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/VB/localbuilder_sample_4.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示局部变量引用的对象是否固定于内存中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory.

value.span: 如果局部变量引用的对象固定于内存中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不安全代码中，必须将固定对象，可以通过非托管指针引用。In unsafe code, an object must be pinned before it can be referred to by an unmanaged pointer. 尽管引用的对象已固定，垃圾回收无法移动它。While the referenced object is pinned, it cannot be moved by garbage collection.

.property instance int32 LocalIndex
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LocalIndex As Integer
public: virtual property int LocalIndex { int get(); };
member this.LocalIndex : int

summary.span: 在方法体中获取局部变量的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Gets the zero-based index of the local variable within the method body.

value.span: 一个整数值，表示方法体内局部变量的声明顺序。

span.span: An integer value that represents the order of declaration of the local variable within the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号分配给本地变量的顺序在它们声明或发出，从零开始。Index numbers are assigned to local variables in the order in which they are declared or emitted, beginning with zero.
